Html: Hey I see that manually editing the item cache in the UI in rawr4 is NYI.  Is there a location where it stores the XML files that I can manually go in and adjust/change/add items?

If you are using Windows Vista or 7, you use the following link

C:\Users\[Username]\AppData\LocalLow\Microsoft\Silverlight\is\

From there look into the folders eventually you should see an "f" folder that holds the cache files. To reset them you use the reset cache in the program and that will redo anything you edited.

As for Adding items, the Wowhead import feature does work. Only issue we currently have with it is source information.
Why are you needing to edit it manually? In the Tools > Edit Items dialog you can add items there or if you are wearing them at time of armory pull they will be added automatically.
